column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: hazard type. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix : <http://www.example.org/hazard#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .:Chemical rdfs:subClassOf :Hazard .:Natural rdfs:subClassOf :Hazard .:Biological rdfs:subClassOf :Hazard .:Cyanide rdfs:subClassOf :Chemical .:Earthquake rdfs:subClassOf :Natural .:Famine rdfs:subClassOf :Biological .:Hazard rdfs:label "Hazard Type"@en .:Chemical rdfs:label "Chemical Hazard"@en .:Natural rdfs:label "Natural Hazard"@en .:Biological rdfs:label "Biological Hazard"@en .:Cyanide rdfs:label "Cyanide"@en .:Earthquake rdfs:label "Earthquake"@en .:Famine rdfs:label "Famine"@en .```
